entities.name: time
entities.description: Time is mentioned as something that has passed. The text states 'n o  t i m e  h a s  p a s s e d', indicating that time has elapsed.

entities.name: they
entities.description: They refers to the people who were knocked to the ground. The text states 'a s  t h o u g h  t h e y  w e r e  m e r e l y  k n o c k e d', indicating that they are still alive.

entities.name: ground
entities.description: The ground is mentioned as the place where they were knocked. The text states 't o  t h e  g r o u n d', indicating a physical location.

relationships.description: Time has passed for them. The text states 'n o  t i m e  h a s  p a s s e d', indicating that time has elapsed since they were knocked to the ground.
